[Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1685)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 358 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

You concentrate ethereal energy and attack a creature's spirit, dealing 16d6 spirit damage with a basic Fortitude save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
